title: BOC wants an entry created on daily transaction bulletin when tx is approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a "Place on 60-Day DL" transaction has been initiated for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the transaction reaches "Approved" state
custom_expected: THEN transaction should appear in current Pending Daily Transactions Bulletin as "Place on 60-day DL - Earliest Reinstatement Date [ insert earliest reinstatement date]"

title: BOC wants an entry created on daily transaction bulletin when tx is reversed
custom_preconds: GIVEN a previously approved "Place on 60-Day DL" transaction exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN status of approved tx is updated to "Reversed"
custom_expected:
THEN previous "Approved" bulletin entry should be removed from pending Daily Transaction Bulletin
OR if it was on a previous Bulletin, then a new entry should be added to the current Pending Daily Transaction Bulletin as "Place on 60-day - Earliest Reinstatement Date [ insert earliest reinstatement date] - Reversed"

title: BOC wants "reversed" bulletin entry removed from pending daily bulletin when tx is suppressed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a previously reversed Place on 60 Day DL tx exists for a player
AND "reversed" bulletin entry for the tx is on the Pending Bulletin
custom_steps: WHEN the tx is suppressed
custom_expected: THEN "reversed" bulletin entry should be removed from the daily bulletin

title: Club user wants to edit existing Place on 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club user is logged in 
AND has a previous Submitted Place on 60 Day DL tx open
AND tx status is not preliminary or rejected
custom_steps:
WHEN user is viewing the form
AND clicks Edit
custom_expected:
THEN a Save button will take the edit buttons place
AND Club user can attach new files 
BUT nothing else
AND clicking save will reload the form in view mode

title: BOC user wants to edit existing Place on 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is logged in 
AND has a previous Submitted Place on 60 Day DL tx open
AND tx status is not Approved or Reversed (including suppressed)
custom_steps:
WHEN user is viewing tx
AND clicks Edit
custom_expected:
THEN a Save button with take the place of the edit button
AND BOC user will be able to edit all fields
AND clicking save will reload the form in view mode

title: User wants to edit existing Place on 60 Day DL tx - Preliminary and Rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as club or BOC user
AND form is in Preliminary or Rejected state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form
AND clicking save will reload the form in view mode

title: BOC user wants to edit existing Place on 60 Day DL tx - Approved and Reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files, edit existing attachments, update Comments, and BOC notes
AND clicking save will reload the form in view mode

title: BOC user wants to see flags if certain rule checks fail
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user has submitted a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND one or more flags is set for the form based on some rule violation
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the flag icon displayed on the form
custom_expected:
THEN system should open a popover with the flags that are currently set for the form (global functionality and styling)
AND flags should display on any Approvals Item generated for the transaction
AND flags should be dismissed upon Approve or Reject of the transaction

title: BOC user wants to see flag for Exam Date more than 10 days ago
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user has submitted a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND flag is set on the transaction for Exam Date entered being more than 10 days ago
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the flag icon displayed on the form
custom_expected:
THEN system should open a popover with the flag "Exam Date entered is more than 10 days ago"
AND flag should display on any Approvals Item generated for the transaction
AND flag should be dismissed upon Approve or Reject of the transaction

title: BOC user receives notification if Club saves a submitted or higher tx with SFD attached
custom_preconds:
GIVEN you are logged in as a CLUB
AND have a submitted "Place on 60 Day DL" tx open
custom_steps:
WHEN user attaches a file with the label "Standard Form of Diagnosis"
AND clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN BOC user should receive a notification (One per tx, should not show twice if saved more than once)

title: User wants to view existing Transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Transfer to 60 Day DL transaction already exists for a player
AND BOC or Club user can see the transaction in the player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the transaction in the player history
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will open in view mode in the same window
AND all fields will match data discovery
AND clicking grey "Close" button will return user to their entry point into the transaction
AND field Current Status will display in red if the transaction is in a preliminary state, green if pending and black for all other states.

title: User wants to create a new Transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected Transfer to 60 Day DL transaction exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Transfer to 60-Day DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Transfer to 60-Day DL" will cause the system to load a new preliminary transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to create a new Transfer to 60 Day DL tx - Preliminary or Rejected tx already exisits
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a preliminary or rejected "Transfer to 60-Day DL" transaction already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Transfer to 60-Day DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Transfer to 60-Day DL" should cause the system to load the existing preliminary or rejected transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to create a new Transfer to 60 Day DL tx - submitted tx already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a submitted "Transfer to 60-Day DL" transaction already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Transfer to 60-Day DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Transfer to 60-Day DL" should cause the system to load the existing submitted transaction in view mode
AND all fields should match data discovery

title: User wants Earliest Reinstatement Date calculated correctly
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to create a "Transfer to 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user enters or changes the Placement Date on the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN the system will calculate and display proper Earliest Reinstatement Date
AND Earliest Reinstatement Date will be on the 61st Day after the initial placement on the DL (NOT the date on the transfer, but the date the player was initially placed on the DL), OR the 61st Day after the start of the Club's Season Start Date, whichever is later

title: User wants to submit a Transfer to 60 Day DL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Transfer to 60-Day DL" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode
AND system should display successful save blue notification #76
AND if player's pending MJ roster status is Rehab 7 Day Concussion, or Rehab 15 Day DL then it should update to "Rehab 60 Day DL"
AND if player's pending MJ roster status is 7 Day Concussion DL, or 15 Day DL then it should update to "60 Day DL"
AND system should create an entry in green font in Player's Player History: Code = TR60J , Description = Transfer to 60-Day DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
AND an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - Major Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from the attachments column of the Approvals Widget
AND any populated comments should be displayed in the comments column of the Approvals Widget
AND clicking Player Name hyperlink should open Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab
AND clicking Type hyperlink should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: BOC user wants to approve a Transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Transfer to 60-Day DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Approve" button
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status should be updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = TR60J Description = Transfer to 60-Day DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font.
AND if player's current MJ roster status is Rehab 7-Day Concussion DL or Rehab 15-Day DL, then system should set MJ roster status to "Rehab 60Day DL"
AND if player's current MJ roster status is 7-Day Concussion DL or 15-Day DL then system should set MJ roster status to "60 Day DL"

title: BOC user wants to reject a Transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Transfer to 60-Day DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND BOC user sees "Reject" button on the transaction in view or edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND pending Player History entry should be removed
AND any action items regarding the transaction should be removed

title: Club user receives notification when transfer to 60 Day DL tx is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer to 60-Day DL" tx exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the tx or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN "Transfer to 60-Day DL" tx reaches an "Approved" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Transfer to 60-Day DL" tx in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user receives notification when transfer to 60 Day DL tx is rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer to 60-Day DL" tx exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the tx or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN "Transfer to 60-Day DL" tx reaches a "Rejected" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Transfer to 60-Day DL" tx in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user receives notification when transfer to 60 Day DL tx is reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer to 60-Day DL" tx exists for a player
AND tx is not suppressed
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the tx or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN "Transfer to 60-Day DL" tx reaches an "Reversed" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Transfer to 60-Day DL" tx in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: User wants to delete a Transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer to 60-Day DL" tx exists for a player
AND the tx is in a Preliminary or Rejected state
AND a user is logged in with edit permissions for the form 
AND grey "Delete" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Delete" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form ("Are you sure you want to delete this [Transfer to 60-Day DL]?"Hint: This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.)
AND yes and no buttons should be displayed
AND clicking yes should close the form with no record kept and return user to entry point of the tx
AND clicking no should return user to the form and take no action
AND deleted tx should not appear on front end or be searchable

title: BOC user wants to reverse a transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer to 60-Day DL" transaction has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks grey "Reverse" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display relevant error or warning messages
AND successful reverse notification should display (message #79)
AND transaction status should update to "Reversed"
AND any action items generated by the transaction should be removed
AND reversed transaction should display in Player History with "Voided" in front of the transaction

title: BOC user wants to suppress a reversed transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a reversed "Transfer to 60-Day DL" transaction exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to suppress the transaction
AND grey "Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC user searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from any other place it is visible on UI
AND any action item generated should be removed

title: BOC user wants to reverse and suppress a transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an approved "Transfer to 60-Day DL" transaction exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to "Reverse and Suppress" the transaction
AND grey "Reverse and Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Reverse and Suppress" from the dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will first be reversed
AND player's Club, MJ, and MN Roster statuses and level of play should be updated to their values from prior to transaction approval
AND transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC user searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from any other place it is visible on UI
AND any action item generated should be removed

title: BOC user wants to reverse a transfer to 60 Day DL tx - not latest approved tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer to 60-Day DL" transaction has been submitted for a player and approved

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reverse" or "Reverse and Suppress" button
custom_expected:

AND clicking "Back" will close modal and return user to the transaction

title: Receive an error creating a Transfer to 60 Day DL tx for a MN league player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to create a "Transfer to 60 Day DL" transaction for a player

custom_steps: WHEN club user selects "Transfer to 60 Day DL" from the Major League Create New menu
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error message "This transaction is for Major League players only."
AND clicking "Back" will close modal and return user to point of entry

title: Club user is preventing from creating a Transfer to 60 Day DL tx for a player NOT belonging to their club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN is logged in as a club user and is attempting to create a "Transfer to 60 Day DL" transaction for a player

custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Transfer to 60 Day DL" on the Create New menu in Player History
custom_expected:
THEN system should display a blocking message "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."
AND clicking "Back" will return the user to the entry point

title: Receive error if player user is attempting to transfer to 60 Day DL is at MN level
custom_preconds:

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "This transaction is for Major League players only."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction

title: Receive error if placement date on tx is futuredated more than 3 days
custom_preconds:

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 3 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if placement date on tx is backdated more than 3 days

AND Placement Date on transaction is 3 or more days prior to the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:

AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if player has a pending or approved tx date after entered assignment date

custom_expected:

AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if player does not have a valid MJ roster status

custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "This player is not on the 7 or 15 day DL. His status is listed as {0}."

title: Receive a warning if user is placing player on DL and reserve list has fewer than 40 players

title: BOC receives error approving a tx without entered comments to explain change in injury details

title: BOC user receives notification if Club user saves a submitted or higher tx with SFD attached
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club user
AND has a Transfer to 60 Day DL tx open that is in a submitted or higher state
custom_steps:
WHEN user attaches a file with the label "Standard Form of Diagnosis"
AND clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN BOC user will receive a notification (One per tx, should not show twice if saved more than once)

title: Receive error if required fields are missing or other on save violations
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is attempting to save a "Transfer to 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND tx is in a submitted or higher state
AND required fields are missing or on save rules have been broken (according to data discovery)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should check all rules detailed in data discovery
AND system should display proper error for any rules that have been violated

title: BOC admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Admin user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Transfer to 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND user should be able to create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND user should be able to Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags

title: BOC basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Basic user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Transfer to 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states.
BUT user should not be able to make any changes or e-sign.

title: Club admin - user's Club is "From Org" or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Admin Permissions
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Transfer to 60 Day DL" transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Admin user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states 
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign Transfer to 60 Day DL tx
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club basic - user's Club is "From Org" or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Basic Permission
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Transfer to 60 Day DL" transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Basic user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction 
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to edit or change these transactions
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club admin - other clubs and BOC only tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user has Club admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view, create, or edit a Transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org"
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: Club basic - other clubs and BOC only tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user has Club basic permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view, create, or edit a Transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: User should be prevented from creating or viewing a tx if they do not have permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in that does not have view permissions for a "Transfer to 60 Day DL" transaction (club-boc-tx-mn)
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view or edit a "Transfer to 60 Day DL" transaction
custom_expected: THEN user should not be able to view or edit transaction

title: User wants to view an existing Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabillitation Assignment" transaction exists for a Player
AND Club or BOC user is attempting to view the transaction from a player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the transaction in player's Player History
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction should open in view mode in the same window
AND all fields should match data discovery (Note: if Rehab Assignment is for player that was on concussion DL it is slightly different)
AND "Close" button is displayed on form in grey
AND clicking "Close" button should return user to their entry point into the transaction
AND Current Status will display in red if the transaction is in a preliminary state, green if pending and black for all other states.

title: User wants to create a new Rehab Assignment tx for a player from their player history
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Rehabilitation Assignment" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND clicking "Rehabilitation Assignment" DL" should load a new Preliminary transaction in edit mode
AND tx should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to create a new Rehab Assignment tx for a player with a concussion
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx exists for the player within the last 10 days
AND player was on DL for a concussion (no reinstatements found since a DL transaction was found for the player with an Injury = Concussion)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Rehabilitation Assignment" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND clicking "Rehabilitation Assignment" DL" should load a new Preliminary transaction in edit mode
AND "Received Medical Director Approval"and "Received Return to Play" checkboxes should be displayed
AND tx should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to create a new Rehab Assignment tx - preliminary or rejected tx already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a preliminary or rejected "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" transaction already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Rehabilitation Assignment" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Rehabilitation Assignment" should cause the system to load the existing preliminary or rejected transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to create a new Rehab Assignment tx - submitted transaction already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a submitted "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" transaction already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Rehabilitation Assignment" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Rehabilitation Assignment" should cause the system to load the existing submitted transaction in view mode
AND all fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants Last Rehab Date calculated correctly on Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to create a "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx for a player
custom_steps: WHEN "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx is loaded, saved, or goes through any state change
custom_expected:
THEN system should correctly calculate Last Rehab Date for the tx
AND Last Rehab Date should be calculated as Assignment Date + Number of Days for Rehab. (Ex: Assignment Date 4/14/16 and # of days = 30, then the Last Rehab Date is 5/13/2016)

title: BOC user wants saving Approved Rehab Assignment to check if "Received Player's Consent" checkbox is checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to save an Approved "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx
AND user has entered new Extensions on the tx
BUT user has not checked the "Received Player's Consent" checkbox for these newly entered Extensions
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Player's written consent is required for Rehab Assignment."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: BOC user wants to add an Extension to Approved Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user is viewing an existing "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx for a player
AND tx is in "Approved" state
AND "Add Extension" button is visible
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Extension"
custom_expected:
THEN Extension section should be added to the form
AND Extension section should match data discovery and wireframe
AND user should be able to complete Extension section and click "Save" on the tx
AND clicking "Save" should run all on Save rule checks and required field and formatting checks
AND successful save blue notification should display

title: BOC user wants to add additional Extension to Approved Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing a Rehab Assignment tx for a player
AND the tx is in an Approved State
AND the tx has at least one extension added
AND "Add Extension" button is visible beneath latest extension
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Add Extension" button
custom_expected:
THEN an additional Extension section should be added to the form
AND extension section should match data discovery and wireframe
AND user should be able to complete extension section and click "Save" on the tx
AND clicking save should run all on Save rule checks and required field and formatting checks
AND successful save blue notification should display

title: BOC user wants to edit existing Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" transaction already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is not in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form

title: BOC user wants to edit existing Rehab Assignment tx - Approved or Reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" transaction already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files, edit existing attachments, update Comments, and BOC notes
BUT user should not be able to edit Assign To, Assignment Date, Number of days for Rehab, or Reason for Rehab fields

title: Club user wants to edit existing Rehab Assignment tx - Preliminary and Rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" transaction already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as club user
AND form is in Preliminary or Rejected state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form

title: Club user wants to edit existing Rehab Assignment tx - not preliminary or rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" transaction already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is not in Preliminary or Rejected state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files to the transaction
BUT user should not be able to edit any other part of the transaction

title: User wants to cancel existing Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx exists for a player
AND a user has opened the existing tx in edit mode
AND grey "Cancel" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Cancel" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes made
AND confirming cancellation should reload the form in default mode for the current state with none of the edits made since last save and up to cancellation point reflected
BUT not confirming cancellation should return the user to the form and take no action

title: User wants to save existing Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" transaction exists for a player
AND transaction is not in post-Approval state
AND a user has opened the existing transaction in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display

title: User wants to save an existing Rehab Assignment tx - Post-Approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" transaction exists for a player
AND transaction is in post-Approval state
AND a user has opened the existing transaction in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN required field and formatting checks should be run
AND transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display

title: User wants to save an existing Rehab Assignment tx  - First time saving
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx exists for a player
AND tx has not been saved previously
AND a user has opened the existing tx in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display
AND transaction status will be set to Preliminary

title: BOC user wants to remove an Extension from an Approved Rehab Assignment tx - only one extension
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx for a player in edit mode
AND tx is in "Approved" state 
AND tx has only one Extension added
AND the Extension has never been saved
AND a trash can is available on the entire section
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the trash can
custom_expected:
THEN the entire Extension section should be removed from the form
AND "Add Extension" button at the bottom of the form should become available again

title: BOC user wants to remove an Extension from an Approved Rehab Assignment tx - multiple extensions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in and viewing a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx for a player in edit mode
AND tx is in "Approved" state 
AND tx has at least one extension added
custom_steps: WHEN user adds a subsequent Extension
custom_expected:
THEN a trash can becomes available on the new Extension
AND clicking the trash can should remove just the newly added set of Extension fields

title: User wants to submit a Place on Rehab Assignment tx to BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Place on rehabilitation assignment" tx
AND tx is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode
AND system should display successful save blue notification #76
AND if player's pending MJ roster status is Rehab 7 Day Concussion, or Rehab 15 Day DL then it should update to "Rehab 60 Day DL"
AND if player's pending MJ roster status is 7 Day Concussion DL their pending roster status should be set to Rehab 7-Day Concussion DL
AND if player's pending MJ roster status is 15 Day DL, their pending roster status should be set to Rehab 15 Day DL
AND if player's pending MJ roster status is 60 Day DL, their pending roster status should be set to Rehab 60 Day DL
AND if player's pending MJ roster status is Restricted, their pending roster status should be set to Restricted/Assigned
AND if player's pending MJ roster status is Suspended, their pending roster status should be set to Suspended/Assigned
AND system should create an entry in green font in Player's Player History: Code = REHAB, Description = Rehabilitation Assignment, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
AND an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - Major Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from the attachments column of the Approvals Widget
AND any populated comments should be displayed in the comments column of the Approvals Widget
AND clicking Player Name hyperlink should open Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab
AND clicking Type hyperlink should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: BOC user wants to approve a Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Place on Rehabiliation Assignment" tx to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Approve" button
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status should be updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = REHAB Description = Rehabilitation Assignment, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font.
AND if player's current MJ roster status is 7-Day Concussion DL  then system should set MJ roster status to Rehab 7-Day Concussion DL
AND if player's current MJ roster status is 15-Day DL then system should set MJ roster status to Rehab 15-Day DL
AND if player's current MJ roster status is 60-Day DL then system should set MJ roster status to Rehab 15-Day DL
AND if player's current MJ roster status is Restricted then system should set MJ roster status to Restricted/Suspended
AND if player's current MJ roster status is Suspended then system should set MJ roster status to Suspended/Assigned
AND player's Rehab Club should be set to the Assignment Club
AND "Club" field on the player profile should update to read "On Rehab With {Rehab Club}"

title: BOC user wants to reject a Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx to BOC for approval
AND BOC user sees "Reject" button on the transaction in view or edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND pending Player History entry should be removed
AND any action items regarding the transaction should be removed

title: User wants to delete Rehab  tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx exists for a player
AND the tx is in a Preliminary or Rejected state
AND a user is logged in with edit permissions for the form 
AND grey "Delete" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Delete" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form ("Are you sure you want to delete this [Place on Rehabilitation Assignment]?"Hint: This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.)
AND yes and no buttons should be displayed
AND clicking yes should close the form with no record kept and return user to entry point of the tx
AND clicking no should return user to the form and take no action
AND deleted tx should not appear on front end or be searchable

title: BOC user wants to reverse a Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks grey "Reverse" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display relevant error or warning messages
AND successful reverse notification should display (message #79)
AND transaction status should update to "Reversed"
AND any action items generated by the transaction should be removed
AND reversed transaction should display in Player History with "Voided" in front of the transaction

title: BOC user wants to suppress a reversed Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a reversed "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to suppress the transaction
AND grey "Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC user searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from any other place it is visible on UI
AND any action item generated should be removed

title: BOC user wants to reverse and suppress a Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an approved "Place on Rehabiliation Assignment" tx exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to "Reverse and Suppress" the transaction
AND grey "Reverse and Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Reverse and Suppress" from the dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will first be reversed
AND player's Club, MJ, and MN Roster statuses and level of play should be updated to their values from prior to transaction approval
AND transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC user searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from any other place it is visible on UI
AND any action item generated should be removed

title: BOC user wants to reverse a Rehab Assignment tx - not latest approved tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user

AND player has one or more approved transactions dated later than selected transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reverse" or "Reverse and Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error message "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."
AND clicking "Back" will close modal and return user to the transaction

title: BOC user wants saving Approved Rehab Assignment with an Extension to append "Extended" to player's player history entry
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has an Approved "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx open in edit mode
AND user has added a new Extension to the tx

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN system should check if an Extension has been added

title: Club user wants saving Approved Rehab Assignment with attachment with "Received Player's Written Consent" label to send notification to BOC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a club user
AND user has an Approved "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx open in edit mode

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:

title: Club user is preventing from creating a tx for a player NOT belonging to their club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN is logged in as a club user and is attempting to create a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" transaction for a player

custom_expected:
THEN system should display a blocking message "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization." Hint Text:"If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact the BOC."
AND clicking "Back" will return the user to the entry point

title: Receive an error creating a tx for a MN league player
custom_preconds:

custom_expected:

title: Receive error if submitting a tx without "Received Player's Written Consent" checkbox being checked

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve

title: User wants to submit a Transfer of Rehab Assignment to BOC for approval

custom_expected:

AND no updates should be made to player's pending roster status

AND an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - Major Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from the attachments column of the Approvals Widget

custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx exists for a player
AND tx has not been saved previously
AND a user has opened the existing tx in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display
AND transaction status will be set to Preliminary

title: BOC user wants approving Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx to create entry in Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" transaction has been initiated for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the transaction reaches "Approved" state
custom_expected: THEN transaction should appear on the current Pending Daily Transaction Bulletin as "Transfer of Rehab from [insert Original Rehab Assignment] to [insert Transfer To]"

title: BOC user wants reversing a Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx to create entry in Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a previously approved "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN status of approved tx is updated to "Reversed"
custom_expected:
THEN previous "Approved" bulletin entry should be removed from pending Daily Transaction Bulletin
OR if it was on a previous Bulletin, then a new entry should be added to the current Pending Daily Transaction Bulletin as "Transfer of Rehab from [insert Original Rehab Assignment] to [insert Transfer To] - Reversed"

title: BOC user wants "reversed" bulletin entry removed from pending daily bulletin when tx is suppressed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a previously reversed Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx exists for a player
AND "reversed" bulletin entry for the tx is on the Pending Bulletin
custom_steps: WHEN the tx is suppressed
custom_expected: THEN "reversed" bulletin entry should be removed from the daily bulletin

title: BOC User wants to add an extension to an existing rehab assignment tx after approving a transfer of Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an approved Rehabilitation Assignment tx exists for a professional player
AND BOC user has approved a subsequent Transfer of Rehab tx for the same player
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to add an extension to the original Rehab Assignment tx
custom_expected: THEN user should be able to add the extension and successfully save the tx

title: User wants to receive error if attempting to Transfer Rehab Assignment for player at MN level
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to create a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" transaction for a player
AND selected player's pending roster (or current if pending unavailable) status is at the minor league level
custom_steps: WHEN club user selects "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" from the Major League Create New menu
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error message "This transaction is for Major League players only."
AND clicking "Back" will close modal and return user to point of entry

title: Club user wants to be prevented from initiating tx for player not belonging to their Club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN is logged in as a club user and is attempting to create a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" transaction for a player
AND player's Current Org is different from logged in club user's Org
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" on the Create New menu in Player History
custom_expected:
THEN system should display a blocking message "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."
AND clicking "Back" will return the user to the entry point

title: User wants to receive error if attempting to create Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx for player without valid MJ roster status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx 
AND selected player's pending (or current if pending is not populated) major league roster status is not Rehab 7-Day Concussion DL, Rehab 15-Day DL or Rehab 60-Day DL, Restricted/Assigned or Suspended/Assigned
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Create
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "This player is not currently on Rehab Assignment. Players must be currently on Rehab Assignment in order to have their Rehab Assignment transferred."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction

title: User wants to receive error if attempting to Transfer player who is at MN level
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx
AND selected player's Pending Roster status is at the Minor League (or current status if player doesn't have pending status)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "This transaction is for Major League players only."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction

title: User wants to receive error if attempting to transfer player without valid MJ roster status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx 
AND selected player's pending (or current if pending is not populated) major league roster status is not Rehab 7-Day Concussion DL, Rehab 15-Day DL or Rehab 60-Day DL, Restricted/Assigned or Suspended/Assigned
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "This player is not currently on Rehab Assignment. Players must be currently on Rehab Assignment in order to have their Rehab Assignment transferred."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction

title: User wants to receive error if selected player has a pending or approved tx after entered assignment date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Transfer from Rehab Assignment" tx 
AND Placement Date on the transaction is before the latest approved or pending (Pending to Club, Submitted to BOC) transaction date for the player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "A transaction cannot occur before the date of the player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: User wants to receive error attempting to submit transfer without "Received Player's Written Consent" checkbox checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to submit a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx
BUT user has not checked the "Received Player's Written Consent" checkbox
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Player's written consent is required for Rehab Assignment."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error attempting to submit transfer with Transfer Date after Last Rehab Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to submit a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx
AND Transfer date on the tx is after Last Rehab Date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Transfer Date cannot be after the Last Rehab Date."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if transfer is back-dated more than 10 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Transfer from Rehab Assignment" tx 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 10 or more days prior to the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Transfer Date must be within 10 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: User wants to receive error if transfer is future-dated more than 10 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Transfer from Rehab Assignment" transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 10 or more days after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Transfer Date must be within 10 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: User wants to receive error if attempting to submit transfer with missing required fields
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is attempting to submit or approve a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" transaction for a player
AND required fields are missing
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should check all rules detailed in data discovery
AND system should display standard error for any rules that have been violated

title: User wants to receive error if attempting to submit tx with Transfer Date before First Game Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is has initiated a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx for player
AND Transfer Date on the tx is before the First Game Date of assignment Club's season
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "The player can only be placed on a rehab assignment during competition: [insert First Game Date] to [insert Last Playoff Game Date]."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with tx

title: User wants to receive error if attempting to submit tx with Transfer Date after Last Playoff Game Date of assignment club's season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is has initiated a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx for player
AND Transfer Date on the tx is after Last Playoff Game Date of assignment club's season
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "The player can only be placed on a rehab assignment during competition: [insert First Game Date] to [insert Last Playoff Game Date]."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with tx

title: BOC user wants to receive notification if Club user saves submitted or higher tx with "Player's Written Consent" upload attached
custom_preconds:

custom_steps:
WHEN user attaches a file with the label "Player's Written Consent"
AND clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN BOC user will receive a notification (once per tx)

title: User wants to receive error if attempting to create Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx for player without valid MJ roster status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx 
AND selected player's pending (or current if pending is not populated) major league roster status is not Rehab 7-Day Concussion DL, Rehab 15-Day DL or Rehab 60-Day DL, Restricted/Assigned or Suspended/Assigned
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "This player is not currently on Rehab Assignment. Players must be currently on Rehab Assignment in order to have their Rehab Assignment transferred."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction

title: BOC approver wants to receive error if attempting to approve Transfer tx with transaction date after current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to approve a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx for a player
AND "Transaction Date" entered on the contract occurs after current date
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN the system should check whether entered "Transaction Date" occurs on or before current date
AND user should see error "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."
AND clicking "Back" will close the modal and return user to the transaction

title: BOC admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Admin user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Transfer from Rehab Assignment" tx for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND user should be able to create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND user should be able to Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags

title: BOC basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Basic user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Transfer from Rehab Assignment" transaction for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states.
BUT user should not be able to make any changes or e-sign.

title: Club admin - user's Club is "From Org" or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Admin Permissions
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Admin user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states 
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign Transfer from Rehab Assignment tx
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club basic - user's Club is "From Org" or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Basic Permission
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Transfer from Rehab Assignment" tx
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Basic user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction 
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to edit or change these transactions
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club admin - other clubs and BOC only tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user has Club admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view, create, or edit a Transfer from Rehab Assignment tx
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org"
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: Club basic - other clubs and BOC only tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user has Club basic permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view, create, or edit a Transfer from Rehab Assignment
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: User should be prevented from creating or viewing a tx if they do not have permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in that does not have view permissions for a "Transfer from Rehab Assignment" tx (club-boc-tx-mn)
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view or edit a "Transfer from Rehab Assignment" tx
custom_expected: THEN user should not be able to view or edit transaction
